summary: Verified new Employer Risk Insights page at /employer/risk-insights. All requested features working correctly - risk score display, 5 category breakdown with expansion, fee impact visualization, and sidebar navigation.
passed_tests: Risk Insights page at /employer/risk-insights - LOADS SUCCESSFULLY

critical_code_review_comments: GOOD: RiskInsights.jsx properly uses EmployerPortalLayout component
GOOD: All 5 risk categories have correct weights totaling 100% (20+35+20+15+10)
GOOD: Fee calculation formula correctly implemented: 3.5% + (3% × (1 - CRS/5))
GOOD: Category expansion with Tips to Improve works correctly
GOOD: Proper data-testid attributes for testing (risk-insights-title, request-review-btn, contact-support-btn)
GOOD: Responsive design with proper spacing and visual hierarchy
NOTE: Risk data uses MOCKED default values (3.5 score) when employer doesn't have risk_score in database - as documented
context_for_next_testing_agent: Risk Insights page fully verified. Sidebar nav includes Risk Insights link with Shield icon. Page displays composite risk score (3.5/5), risk rating badge (B), fee percentage (4.40%), 5 category breakdown with expandable tips, fee impact scenarios, and improvement steps. MOCKED: Default risk score of 3.5 used when employer.risk_score is null in database.
